lenders.name: Thina
lenders.loan_because:
It's better to help one than none, and this is a brilliant way to do so, help people so they can help themselfs. 
If we all help just one, the world will be at better place.

lenders.name: Bonita
lenders.loan_because: I get the warm feeling of making a donation, but will probably get the money back.
lenders.occupational_info: I make visual things that help me understand the world.

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: I've seen the need. Kiva provides a way to use the same dollars over and over again to help meet people's needs.

lenders.name: Alexis
lenders.loan_because: Helping others always makes the world a better place.

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: Dad, before you died in 1994 you and I read about the internet.  Back then we could not imagine what in the WORLD it might be truly useful for.   Now we know:  to 'help REPAIR the world' - one of the motives that guided your life and travels!
lenders.occupational_info: My Kiva goal: To help fund loans to Central American women entrepreneurs....

lenders.name: Joel
lenders.loan_because: the loans are for motivated people who spend their money wisely and effectively to help their family and community.
lenders.occupational_info: I build internet applications and sites to help people promote and share their info on the web, not unlike the people who built Kiva.

lenders.name: Lee
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I help design / install / service HVAC systems>

lenders.name: deborah
lenders.loan_because: I believe we can't all help everyone but everyone can help someone!
lenders.occupational_info: Fun, challenging, exciting!

lenders.name: Fred
lenders.loan_because: I desire to do something tangible to improve the world and believe we are at our best when helping others.

lenders.name: Dashiell Gordon
lenders.loan_because: It is a way for me to help the world out!
lenders.occupational_info: Education.

lenders.name: Patty
lenders.loan_because: I like to be of service to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I play and teach music.  I love each day!!!

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: i have been given so much that i have much to give.

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: I love supporting people's success.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist people to make life-changing transformations in their lives.

lenders.name: Ty
lenders.occupational_info: I study water in high mountainous areas.

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate to have many opportunities given to me in my lifetime.  This is one small way I can share that with others who have not been as fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a computer analyst at a rehabilitation hospital in Honolulu, Hawaii, USA.  In my spare time I like to surf.  I also volunteer for Access Surf Hawaii (www.accesssurf.org), an organization that helps people with disabilities get into the ocean to surf & swim.

lenders.name: Deena
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel very good.
lenders.occupational_info: I help discover the past.

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: it's important to help others
lenders.occupational_info: I give people a second chance at financial stability by helping them eliminate debt.

lenders.name: Lam Vu
lenders.loan_because: I would like the poor people to have a better life and their children to have a chance in life.

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: I sure wish someone would have made funds available to me when I really needed them.

lenders.name: Koen&Angeline
lenders.loan_because: this is an efficient way of helping others

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping women in developing countries so they can support themselves and their children.

lenders.name: Claire Marie
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune with others.

lenders.name: Jenn
lenders.loan_because: Small things make a big difference.  With the generosity and compassion of those who can assist, we can make a difference in the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children in an urban downtown elementary school.  Many of our students come from other countries either as refugees or as landed immigrants.  These families have endured more than I could ever imagine and it's my passion to bring peace into their lives.

lenders.name: Day-Stafford
lenders.loan_because: We enjoy linking up with other people around the world to keep resources moving and to put money to good use.
lenders.occupational_info: Rod is a Mennonite pastor, very interested in issues of faith and justice.  Molly is a social worker, helping families deal with mental illness and recover from abuse and trauma.  Julia and Laura are students.

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: Because I believe that these loans really do make a difference, and it allows people to help themselves and has a long term impact, and the area of microfinancing has proven to not only be effective, but it also seems to be a great way to combat the current economic downturn with the people who need it most.  Plus, they are small loans that we, as lenders, can take part in and afford.
lenders.occupational_info: I attend university to get an education and I will hopefully be able to help even more people in the future.  My degree is International Affairs with a concentration in East Asian business.

lenders.name: kc
lenders.loan_because: giving back is something that everyone should do to help others, not only in need but just to help just because.

lenders.name: Libby & Brandon
lenders.loan_because: Because we have been lucky enough to have wonderful lives and it makes us happy to help others
lenders.occupational_info: We make coffee drinks for people.

lenders.name: Dennis
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I am blessed with more than I need simply because of where I was born. It is my privilege to share some of that with others in the hope that it may do some good.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a company that manufactures electronic devices. My job is to sit at a desk and run a computer all day. It’s boring and dull. I don’t get any exercise so I get fat and my mind grows dull from staring at the computer screen. In many ways I am envious of the people I lend to. Have a great life.

lenders.name: Eliot
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: shopkeep and I own an old building which I am fixing up

lenders.name: H Hanna
lenders.loan_because:
"We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give."

Winston Churchill

lenders.name: mark
lenders.loan_because: There are so many people out there that work hard and do so much with so little. They just need a little help; it means so much to them.

lenders.name: stacey and jon
lenders.loan_because: we want to see the personal changes we can affect with our contributions

lenders.name: Shawn
lenders.loan_because: I would like to contribute to the success of someone resourceful and committed enough to seek sources like Kiva to reach their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: President of two firms.  One is Electronic Component Manufacturing, and one is Payment Processing.

lenders.name: Martina
lenders.loan_because: $25 for two weeks of coffee .... or actually making a difference? That was an easy decision for me.
lenders.occupational_info: I have two of the most fulfilling jobs in the world - helping students learn, and raising the greatest little girl in the world.

lenders.name: Matt and Doreen
lenders.loan_because: the world needs some good news!
lenders.occupational_info: Matt maintains UNIX computer server systems.  Doreen teaches English at University.  and Evelin is the coolest kid ever.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves the opportunity to succeed---and that most of us need a leg-up to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a college study-abroad program in South India, helping facilitating students' learning and cultural immersion by advising, counseling, and sharing my own personal experiences in India.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: This is a brilliant, efficient, simple way to get capital to those in need. This is not charity -- it's a way to extend to others the financial services that we take for granted here in the West. Oh, and it's cool to help people. The Karma thing.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a global risk mitigation firm, especially focusing in cyber security and cyber crime. I am also a reserve officer in the Air Force, having served in Afghanistan.

lenders.name: Fred and Mary Beth
lenders.occupation: Own Cedar House Inn & Yurts, Bed and Breakfast Inn
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to loan a small amount of money that can help in a big way. As a small business owner we understand how difficult it can be to raise funds to start and expand a business. In other countries it can be even more difficult since capital sources are not available.
lenders.occupational_info: We own an eco friendly a bed and breakfast inn in the North Georgia mountains. We have rooms in the inn and yurts as well. We strive to be sustainable in our operations and try to create an awareness among our guests about living green.

lenders.name: Lara Hanson
lenders.loan_because: I can!  :)

lenders.name: Kerri
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do, to help others get a leg up in life and give back in appreciation of the good life we have here.
lenders.occupational_info: I want to help others to make the most of their own potential especially for the people I love in Honduras and Guatemala.

lenders.name: Garry
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others and I recognize that life has provided me with more than a few good breaks and sharing my financial success with others is important.
lenders.occupational_info: I start up new businesses in the electronics industry.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: its important to share our resources with others.  Together we can make a difference in our world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers and write programs that help people run their businesses.

lenders.name: Randy and Barb
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do. We need to help one another.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I have the resources and others need them.  I hope I can make a difference in the world....no matter how small.
lenders.occupational_info: I spend a lot of time volunteering and traveling.

lenders.name: Rico
lenders.loan_because: We need to help each other out.
lenders.occupational_info:
Hace más que treinta años que he enseñado y he ayudado otras personas y me gustaría continuar con este trabajo por muchos años más.

(I have taught and helped others for more than thirty years and would like to continue with this work for many more.)

lenders.name: Jodi
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference & here I can make a choice & see who I am helping
lenders.occupational_info: learning and teaching people about technology

lenders.name: Henry
lenders.loan_because: I had a chance to meet a bushman from Kenya in the fall of 07.  I was rock climbing at Smith Rock State Park, he was on hike during a sponsored visit to the US. He was amazed he had never seen people do such a thing, he marveled at our ropes.  As I stood next to him and shook his hand, I noticed he was a little bigger than half my size. I thought "this dude has to chase down his own bush meat".  Later I thought, my life is mundane enough I have to actively invent exciting things to do!  My belief is most charities usually have a secondary agenda plus poor cash management and worse execution.  Engineers without Borders is a great group but seem to be preoccupied with not causing the slightest political issue.  I was excited to learn about micro lending because the folks borrowing the money already have the vision, drive and a goal mapped out, they just need a little cash (by our standards) to get rolling to create their new future for themselves.  They don’t need a catalyst, handout or motivational speech, just a little capital.  If they default it is no big deal to me, I would prefer if they did not because they would just hurting the next person in need of loan more than me.
lenders.occupational_info: My purpose is to use my knowledge and skills to help my customers achieve their goals.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: Anyone with an idea and passion to build and contribute deserves a shot at executing such.
lenders.occupational_info: First - I love my wife, family and dogs.  I am thankful for what I have and the chances I have received in my life.  I work for a large multi-national commercial bank.  I love my job and the company I work for.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I want to help disadvantaged people in the third world.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide therapeutic support to hospital patients requiring assistance in breathing.

lenders.name: Greg & Melinda
lenders.loan_because: We have enough to share. Thru Kiva a little money can do so much for others trying to better their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a partner in a company that designs medical products. My wife is a retired finance director from a large manufacturing company.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: It keeps me connected in a small way with places in the world I've visited.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I feel that even though I am only lower middle class, I have much more money and many more opportunities than women in other countries do.  I feel that I need to share my abundance with other people.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach adult immigrants how to speak English so that can interact in their community, their children's schools and in order to get better jobs.  I also teach native English students who need to complete their high school education so that they can get better jobs and feel better about themselves.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: women must help other women to be successful!
lenders.occupational_info: we develop training programs

lenders.name: S2RKC
lenders.loan_because: We want to invest in people's lives so that they can have a better quality of life and provide for their families.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me with the ability to live comfortably, and I hope to give that same gift to others.

lenders.name: Paola
lenders.loan_because: I care of people that have dreams and work hard to get them!
lenders.occupational_info: It is creative and fun.  I help people to enhance their business with creativity and idea placement.

lenders.name: Brad
lenders.loan_because: We're all in this together.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an educator at a college, coordinating an office that helps students identify, plan, and achieve their educational, career and life goals.

lenders.name: Elena
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of being able to make a big difference in peoples lives with small loans that I can give over and over again.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Environmental Science at an American High School in Southern France.

lenders.name: Helen
lenders.loan_because: Thank you Kiva for giving people an opportunity to participate in such a meaningful way.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: kal
lenders.loan_because: ... Kiva allows me to SEE my actions make a difference in the world... wow!

lenders.name: Jo Ellen
lenders.loan_because: I've had times in my life where a little boost and a helping hand was all that was needed to stay encouraged and strive onward..and I love the idea that my little bit of $$ can make a difference to someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I get up early..usually 2:30 a.m. to get airplanes ready for their flights, meet and greet people, load luggage and then come home to become a regular mom doing laundry, cooking, house cleaning..and volunteering with boy scouts and church....busy, busy..and then take time to do nothing but read and relax.

lenders.name: Bethany
lenders.loan_because: when I loan I know that I am helping someone who doesn't have the money at the time to go and buy the things they need while others sit at home playing game systems and it is imprtant to donate to others who could use a helping hand.

lenders.name: Trent
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people around the world.

lenders.name: Elaine
lenders.loan_because: Private business is essential.  It is wonderful that I can help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Lea
lenders.occupation: An 8th grade student at Slater Middle School

lenders.name: Lara
lenders.loan_because: because my nutcase of a brother in law gave me a gift certificate for Christmas.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an educator, naturalist, wife and mother.

lenders.name: Annalis
lenders.loan_because: My Godmother said it was a good idea.
lenders.occupational_info: All consuming

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: They need it, I have it
lenders.occupational_info: Information Technology

lenders.name: Tobias
lenders.loan_because: We're all just folk.

lenders.name: louise
lenders.loan_because: Because I believe I have a responsibility and the privilege to support others. . Giving back feels like truly participating in the cycle of life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with individuals and organizations to build stronger workplace relationships, reduce conflict and increase emotional intelligence.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place.   I'm blessed to not worry about where my food and clothing are coming from and I want to help other's to have the same opportunity.

lenders.name: Lea
lenders.occupation: 8th grade student at Slater Middle School
lenders.loan_because: I love being able to help others less fortuate than myself
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school, do my homework, and that's pretty much it!

lenders.name: Ann & Grant
lenders.loan_because: We're delighted by the respectfulness of helping others as equals. We love the way these loans say "We believe in you and your abilities & together we can work toward a better future!" We're also excited to think that our money can keep on helping, over & over again...as each loan is repaid it can be re-invested...how fantastic! Plus each time we look at all the people we're in a lending group with...our world becomes a happier safer place.

lenders.name: Josh
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate to be in a position to help others.  I believe that the best way to achieve peace is not through force, but by helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a producer for a computer game company.

lenders.name: Yaffa
lenders.loan_because: I believe in micro credit loans, the benefits of economic development and the power of self esteem, self reliance and self empowerment.
lenders.occupational_info: I am lucky enough at work to have  benefits, health coverage and a pension plan.  It is my wish that others are able to create a safety net for themselves and their families and provide food, shelter, safety and education for their children.

lenders.name: Mary and Chris
lenders.loan_because: We are so thankful for the  many blessings in our life - a great and loving family, a roof over our heads and steady employment.  It feels good to be able to help others who are trying to better themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Kelsey
lenders.occupational_info: I am in school learning to be a teacher

lenders.name: Blaine
lenders.loan_because: It makes a big difference.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: I admire entrepreneurship ventures worldwide.
lenders.occupational_info: Oceanographic Engineer

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: Ken gave me a wonderful Christmas present in the fom of a KIVA gift certificate.
lenders.occupational_info: Author: Every Natural Fact; Five Seasons of Open-Air Parenting.

lenders.name: My Daddy&My Suky
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a small impact to specific people in less fortunate circumstances.  We love the micro-loan concept that Kiva supports.
lenders.occupational_info: I help organizations define and achieve their identities, faster and more efficiently.

lenders.name: Emanuele
lenders.occupational_info: Seo Specialist - esperto di posizionamento siti internet nei motori di ricerca e web marketing

lenders.loan_because: Our family enjoys helping out as much as we can!

lenders.occupation: Jim is Mechanic, Vicki is Manager, Human Services
lenders.loan_because: For just a little money, you can make a difference in someone's life. And we love bikes!!!
lenders.occupational_info: Jim fixes cars. Vicki takes care of two women who have Down's Syndrome.

lenders.name: jerry
lenders.loan_because: I want to see others succeed for their families future.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired software developer & registered architect

lenders.name: Marney
lenders.loan_because: I need to do something to help and feel that enabling people to improve their lives is very important.

lenders.name: Chelle Davidson
lenders.loan_because: I think it's such a powerful way to truly be a global citizen and participant.
lenders.occupational_info: I help run a small biodiesel production and distribution company.  Our goal is to produce biodiesel using waste vegetable oil, not virgin feedstock

lenders.name: Talina
lenders.loan_because: I feel so lucky to be born in Australia and to have enough to share with someone less fortunate. I have worked hard to succeed and I would want every human to have the same opportunity, this can't happen unless I help where people earn less than $4 a day. I am blessed to have had education and enough to eat.
lenders.occupational_info: I am involved and caring for and healing people. I love to spend time with my 2 children and 4 grandchildren, I enjoy gardening , reading ,writing and walking .

lenders.name: isaiah
lenders.occupational_info: I am 10 years old and I go to 4th grade at La Junta Intermediate School.

lenders.name: PermacultureDesign
lenders.loan_because: Of the need; and the absolute ease in which KIVA allows anyone to help brothers and sisters around the world realize their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: Architectural & landscape design, construction and property maintenance

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: as a follower of Jesus, He stated, "'It is more blessed to give than to receive" (Acts 20:35). Jesus gave His life for me. Helping others financially, to improve their lives, is the least that I can do.
lenders.occupational_info: I lead a church that seeks to introduce people to Jesus Christ and to help them mature in Christlikeness.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: It gives people a chance at a better life. Everyone deserves opportunity!
lenders.occupational_info: Transformational, spiritual, pastoral, justice oriented, organizational, truth telling, radical.

lenders.name: denise aldelia
lenders.loan_because:
I've been helped in my life so many times.
I would like to help others.
lenders.occupational_info:
I dispense medication from a neighborhood pharmacy to people that include family and friends. Some customers  have become friends through the 16 years I have worked for the company. My job is rewarding because I help people get through illnesses. I can sympathize when they are ill and rejoice when they get better.I hope my caring is part of what gets them better.I am a people person so I look forward to coming to work. I'm fortunate to live in the beautiful santa cruz county of california.
close to ocean and mountains.

lenders.name: Kara
lenders.loan_because: Everybody deserves a fair chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I help organize people to make flashy ads for the internet.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I believe it makes the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a lawyer and represent businesses.

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people in countries I've visited in similar lines of work to my own
lenders.occupational_info: I love photographing people

lenders.name: Zenia
lenders.loan_because: I know what it's like to start from zero.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I received a gift certificate for Christmas from my daughter.  She knows how much I like to help people

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: It's a good thing to do....

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It's a pleasure to help people who are working so hard for a better life.  I also just love the Kiva model and web site!

can make a big ripple effect.

Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.

lenders.occupational_info: I act as a middle man between the Business and Information Technology department.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.occupational_info: Positive influencer #1. Problem solver #2. Have many university degrees but the above is what I do.

lenders.name: Lam

to give him money isn't charity

lenders.loan_because: i care.

lenders.loan_because: I am inspired by women in Africa and their incredible strength and resiliency.  I believe strong women are the key to overcoming adversity and for teaching the next generation to prosper.

lenders.name: Lisa

lenders.name: Ken and Julie

lenders.name: boutique|mac
lenders.loan_because: As a business owner, I know from experience that lack of access to capital can limit the success of someone who has an otherwise solid business plan and the energy and motivation to execute it.  I can only imagine the challenges that a business owner in a less developed country may face.  I see Kiva as an amazing opportunity to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a retail Macintosh computer store located in Nanaimo, BC, Canada

lenders.name: Nadia
lenders.loan_because: i believe that everyone should have the right to a future and to feed there family.

lenders.name: Nathan
lenders.loan_because: It is so empowering knowing that collectively, no matter how how large or little one can give, a community of citizens devoted to alleviating poverty to small business owners all over the world can do so because of Kiva.  It is just another way one can positively impact the world with little effort!
lenders.occupational_info: I sell computers, portable music devices and phones to consumers and business professionals and teach them how to best utilize them at the Apple Store.

lenders.name: Theresa
lenders.loan_because: my sister inspired me to participate and help others with such a simple gesture
lenders.occupational_info: I look after children for a family where both parents are working outside of the home

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Kiva has allowed me to be more directly involved with those in need and I find the experience very rewarding.
lenders.occupational_info: I trade and invest in the stock market.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because:
"The best portion of a good man's life are his little, nameless, unremembered acts of kindness and love." 
-William Wordsworth

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: I been given opportunies in my life. I feel the need to provide that to others...
lenders.occupational_info: Doing all I can to help my students love the process of discovery, and tolerate risk.

lenders.name: Nicole, Dan & Mackenzie
lenders.loan_because: We love.

lenders.name: Rodrigo
lenders.loan_because: One must feed the soul whenever one is not at his best.
lenders.occupational_info: Sharing information and experience.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: Altruism of course :P

lenders.name: Neil
lenders.loan_because: I firmly believe in the good this site is accomplishing.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because:
emailed to my sister after she sent me a second kiva gift certificate....-" thanks again for the gc. it was a bright point in my day today to use it. here is where it went. i like her smile."

her response- "my only concern, (sometimes) is that people have the idea - that "we're helping them" (the poor people) based on economic position.  and in reality, we help each other...."

so so true.................---in reality we help each other---

thanks, Kiva people, for letting us

lenders.name: Hector & Ana

We hope that others would be just as compassionate and understanding if the shoe were on the other foot.

lenders.occupational_info: I look for interesting business projects and build companies around them. We are currently building a Biodiesel production facility.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: These individuals are in a position to know how they can make their own lives and the lives of their families and neighbours better. It's the idea that the loan is going directly to a real person who will benefit and pass on the benefit to their communities that is so appealing.
lenders.occupational_info: I make stained glass panels and jewellery from my own studio. I'm very lucky to be able to be creative and do what I enjoy so much - and that others are willing to pay me to do it.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: As the child of an immigrant to the United States, I am fortunate to have been able to have gotten a great education and to make a good living.  I want to be able to make loans to help others improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: My job is to design information systems and processes to help gather financial and management information for a global company.

lenders.name: T.S.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a commercial printing company

lenders.name: Elizabeth

lenders.name: joakim
lenders.loan_because: it helps people

lenders.name: Allison
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate because of the opportunities that have been given to me in my life.  I have traveled all around the world, and I know that a little can go a long way.  I especially have a connection with Peru.
lenders.occupational_info: I research and plan tours to South America for a large US tour operator.  We send groups of travelers on tours which I help design.  I want to use hotels, restaurants, shops etc. that are locally owned so that the benefit from incoming tourism dollars can stay in the local community as much as possible.  We also send our travelers to visit and support projects which help children.  I believe tourism is a very powerful tool for creating understanding and peace.

lenders.name: Leo
lenders.loan_because: Small acts of kindness can cause a large ripple of hope and change
lenders.occupational_info: I am a water industry executive who has been battling cancer for 3 years and now take every day as a gift and have been blessed with a loving family and friends who inspire me everyday.

lenders.occupational_info: I sell insurance protection to help a family even if the entrepreneur dies or is hurt and not able to work.

lenders.name: sarah
lenders.loan_because: I want to whatever I can to make the world a better place, and to give hope and encouragement to these people I see here, trying to work hard to make a better life.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: as i have  traveled i have recived help from people i did not know and they ask for not a thing in return.

lenders.name: Janine & Family
lenders.loan_because: My family, and I, were blessed to be born in a prosperous country and to financially comfortable families.  I have always been aware of the random good luck we were all afforded and I think it is very important to give back to others less fortunate.  Kiva is the perfect way to do this.  It is also wonderful that my children can be involved in helping other families around the world.  This is a great tool to help the children learn "gratitude" for what they have and "be of service" to those less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I LOVE being a mother!  This is the most important and precious job I'll ever have.  My hope is that my two daughters grow up with strong self-esteem and that they are solid world citizens that live purposeful lives.  I also have a passion for environmentalism.  I work at reducing our families' consumption and work toward being more environmentally responsible.

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others improve their standard of living.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop software to help courts do their work more efficiently.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: It is a way for me as an individual to empower people that want a better life for themselves and their loved ones.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I like to give women around the world the resources to raise their families standard of living.  By lending them the money to run a business, it will help their daughters and sons have a good life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at an Arts Center where we build community through the arts by offering concerts, classes, art exhibits and theater productions.

lenders.name: Creatively Independent
lenders.occupation: Artistic Director of a revolutionary arts education company
lenders.loan_because: we are all connected in this world, striving to be more sustainable in our passions.
lenders.occupational_info: ESS PILLMORE, co-founder of the revolutionary arts education company, Creatively Independent, will “rearrange your brain.” Jess has toured over 20 years activating self-efficacy through the arts. Jess is an international guest artist (K-post grad, professional development, conferences), director/choreographer (International, Off-Broadway, fringe, regional, educational), singer/songwriter (3 national releases, 1 musical), sustainable artistry coach and published author for HowlRound and Psychology Today. Her book “Creatively Independent” was supported by international best-seller Seth Godin. CURRENT PROJECTS: developing "A Fire Just Waiting" featuring Ani DiFranco’s music and devising a re-imagined Midsummer. TRAINING: MFA Interdisciplinary Arts (Goddard), BA Theatre (FSU)

lenders.name: Garth
lenders.loan_because: My sister-in-law gave us money to start an account and we enjoy giving other people an opportunity to help their families and others.
lenders.occupational_info: We are doing this as a family.  I work for a government agency on computer equipment.  My wife helps government agencies by providing expert advice.  My children in the picture are 8 and 6 years old and are from China.

lenders.loan_because: it's ethical, it's easy, and it's endorsed by Bill Clinton.

I hope to obtain my masters in international relations in a few years.

lenders.name: Surfmerchants

lenders.occupational_info: We designed a web-based application that a good majority of the mystery shopping industry uses to function.  It covers all aspects of the process, from finding shoppers to evaluate the businesses to reporting packages that compile the data into a usable format for the ultimate end client.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: One day I'd like to see a world without extreme poverty or destitution. This is my small contribution.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I expect to pass through life but once. If therefore, there be any kindness I can show, or any good thing I can do to any fellow being, let me do it now, and not defer or neglect it, as I shall not pass this way again. ~William Penn
lenders.occupational_info: I provide industrial generators to hospitals, townships and various corporations.  I am also a history and political science major who spends weekends volunteering with the USO and community based organizations.

lenders.name: Norman & Kathy
lenders.loan_because: We are children of God, and God loves a cheerful giver. God has blessed us so that we may  bless others in His name.

lenders.name: Krystle
lenders.loan_because: we all need help getting started, and I feel blessed that I can join my money with others to help give others an opportunity to support themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I drive ambulances and take care of people during emergencies.  I have taken 4 full years of schooling to get trained.

lenders.name: Timothy
lenders.loan_because: On the global scale, I am doing very very well and it is only right to help others get a leg up.
lenders.occupational_info: From Wikipedia: Patent examiners review patent applications to determine whether they should become a patent, this includes searching patent and scientific literature databases for prior art, and substantively examining patent applications, that is examining whether the claimed invention meets the patentability requirements such as novelty, "non-obviousness", "utility" and sufficiency of disclosure.

lenders.name: Bert
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference for families in need
